      • setWiperLock

        public void setWiperLock(com.pi4j.component.potentiometer.microchip.impl.DeviceControllerChannel channel,
                         boolean locked)
                  throws IOException
        Enables or disables a wiper's lock.

        Hint: This will only work using the "High Volate Command" (see 3.1).

        Parameters:
        channel - Which wiper
        locked - Whether to enable the wiper's lock
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if communication fails or device returned a malformed result

      • setWriteProtection

        public void setWriteProtection(boolean enabled)
                        throws IOException
        Enables or disables the device's write-protection.

        Hint: This will only work using the "High Volate Command" (see 3.1).

        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether to enable write-protection
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if communication fails or device returned a malformed result
